snippet: Tomasz Wiech sought to capture the tug between Poland's socialist past and the country's free-market present. Melancholy and minimalist, his pictures portray "a land of the giant question mark."
abstract: Tomasz Wiech sought to capture the tug between Poland's socialist past and the country's free-market present. Melancholy and minimalist, his pictures portray "a land of the giant question mark."
